snippet.title: Longplay of Shinobi
snippet.description:
Longplay of Shinobi, played as the NTSC version on the PlayStation 2. This game's version was released on Oct. 11th, 2002. Tell us what you think by leaving a comment down below!

0:00:00 - Start
0:00:28 - Introduction
0:04:57 - Stage 1 - A
0:10:28 - Boss 01 - Helicopter
0:13:30 - Stage 1 - B
0:20:34 - Boss 02 - Aomizuchi
0:23:51 - Stage 2 - A
0:29:22 - Boss 03 - Shirogane & Akagane
0:30:47 - Stage 2 - B
0:37:09 - Boss 04 - Hell Helicopter
0:40:17 - Stage 3 - A
0:49:42 - Boss 05 - Hakuraku
0:52:10 - Stage 3 - B
0:59:27 - Boss 06 - Shirakumo
1:01:35 - Stage 4 - A
1:10:37 - Boss 07 - Homura 
1:13:19 - Stage 4 - B
1:22:29 - Boss 08 - Benisuzume
1:25:59 - Stage 5 - A
1:31:44 - Boss 09 - Kongou
1:34:59 - Boss 10 - Kurakuda (Stage 5 - B)
1:37:16 - Stage 6 - A
1:43:34 - Boss  11 - Kizami
1:46:28 - Boss 12 - Yatsurao (Stage 6 - B)
1:50:25 - Stage 7 - A 
2:00:56 - Boss 13 - Ageha 
2:04:50 - Boss 14 - Moritsune (Stage 7 - B)
2:08:06 - Stage 8 - A
2:15:34 - Stage 8 - B
2:27:42 - Final Boss - Hiruko
2:34:42 - Ending and Credits

Extras
2:39:59 - Moritsune Gameplay
2:42:48 - Gallery 
2:44:28 - E3 - Special
2:48:53 - Stage EX - Level 01
2:49:51 - Stage EX - Level 02
2:51:02 - Stage EX - Level 03
2:52:43 - Stage EX - Level 04
2:55:17 - Stage EX - Level 05
2:56:19 - Stage EX - Level 06
2:57:49 - Stage EX - Level 07
2:59:24 - Stage EX - Level 08
3:00:27 - Stage EX - Final

By: DeShelly
